translation.en: You know, there's nothing like the experience of raising your first dog.
translation.ja: 初めて犬を飼うことは 素晴らしい経験だ

translation.en: The simple joy of walking side by side with your buddy... ...out in the fresh air, throwing a stick.
translation.ja: 小枝を投げてやりながら 寄り添って散歩する喜び

translation.en: Spending some quiet time, just you and your very best friend.
translation.ja: “親友”と ふたりきりで 静かな時を過ごす

translation.en: Of course, that wasn't my experience.
translation.ja: でも それは 僕の経験とは違う

translation.en: That kid's not even me.
translation.ja: この少年は僕ではない

translation.en: That's me.
translation.ja: これが僕

translation.en: And that crazy hound I'm chasing is Marley, the world's worst dog.
translation.ja: 疾走しているのはマーリー “世界一 バカな犬”

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん！

translation.en: Or so I thought. But our story begins before Marley was born...
translation.ja: この物語は マーリーが 生まれる前から始まる

translation.en: ...four years before, on my wedding day...
translation.ja: ４年前の結婚式⸺

translation.en: ...which happened to be the day of the worst freak spring blizzard...

translation.en: ...in the history of southern Michigan, the same day our car broke down.
translation.ja: その日はミシガン州で 記録的な春の雪が降った 車が壊れたけど 気にならなかった

translation.en: But we didn't care.

translation.en: Oh, God, that feels so good.
translation.ja: すごく気持ちいい

translation.en: So, what do you think that means, a blizzard on your wedding day?

translation.en: Is that good luck? Is that bad luck?

translation.en: I think it's good luck.
translation.ja: 幸運の しるしよね

translation.en: -How did I get you? -What?
translation.ja: なぜ結婚できた？

translation.en: Honestly, how did I--? How did I get that lucky?

translation.en: Well, you know...

translation.en: ...I get asked that question all the time.
translation.ja: 私も いつも そう思ってるのよ

translation.en: Come on. Are you kidding, honey?

translation.en: You're part of the plan.
translation.ja: あなたは“計画”の一部

translation.en: -The plan? -My plan.

translation.en: Step one, meet an incredibly sweet, smart, sexy man.
translation.ja: 私の計画 その１ 猛烈に優しく 頭のいい セクシーな男性と出会う

translation.en: Done. Step two?

translation.en: Marry you instead.
translation.ja: 代わりに あなたと結婚

translation.en: Then step three--
translation.ja: 計画 その３

translation.en: -I don't think I can take any more. -You don't want to hear step three?
translation.ja: これ以上 聞くのは不安だよ

translation.en: -What's step three? -It's easy.
translation.ja: その３は？ 簡単よ

translation.en: -Be gentle. -Move someplace warmer.

translation.en: I knew you were gonna say that.
translation.ja: そう言うと思った

translation.en: -All right, you know you got this, right? -Oh, yeah. I got it.

translation.en: -Who are you? -I'm John Grogan?

translation.en: No, you're John frigging Grogan, who's about to get a job as a reporter...

translation.en: ...for a major metropolitan newspaper.
translation.ja: 有力な⸺ 大新聞の記者になる

translation.en: -I don't feel like getting out of the car. -Well, you have to.
translation.ja: 車を降りたくない

translation.en: -Why don't we drive around the block? -No, baby. Come on, get out of the car.

translation.en: -Now, who am I again? -Oh, please.

translation.en: -Sebastian says you won some award? -Mitchy. Yeah, I have a Mitchy.

translation.en: It's like a Pulitzer, but from western Michigan.

translation.en: A Mitchy.

translation.en: Well, as you know, Sebastian and I were in college together, and he--

translation.en: He was always saying how great South Florida is... ...and that maybe my wife and I might enjoy it here...

translation.en: ...so we decided to come down here.
translation.ja: 越してきたんです

translation.en: -Are you a comedian too? -Excuse me?

translation.en: Like your friend over here?

translation.en: -No. -He's walking a very thin line.

translation.en: It's a good thing he knows how to write.
translation.ja: 優秀でなかったら セバスチャンは とうにクビだ

translation.en: So your wife is Jenny Havens?

translation.en: Yes. Jenny Grogan, because we're married. She took my name.

translation.en: -She get the job at the Post? -Yes, she did.

translation.en: -Why didn't they want you over there? -Well, I didn't apply.

translation.en: Jenny's more of a feature writer, and I'm more of a straight news writer.
translation.ja: 妻はコラムや連載を担当 僕は記者ですから

translation.en: I thought this would be a better fit for that.
translation.ja: タイプが違います

translation.en: I don't know if I'm better. I--

translation.en: What I do know is that I have a tendency to surprise myself.
translation.ja: でも 僕は 驚きに満ちた人間です

translation.en: Ten years ago I was doing bong hits and playing "Donkey Kong."

translation.en: I never dreamed I'd get into college, but I did, and I graduated with honors.
translation.ja: 遊んでばかりいたのに ちゃんと大学に入れたし⸺ 優秀な成績で卒業しました

translation.en: And I never thought I'd get a job at a real newspaper, but I did.
translation.ja: そして 憧れだった 新聞社に就職し⸺

translation.en: And I certainly never thought I'd get a girl like Jenny Havens to marry me...
translation.ja: そして 憧れだった 新聞社に就職し⸺ ジェニーと 結婚までできたんですから

translation.en: ...but I did.
translation.ja: ジェニーと 結婚までできたんですから

translation.en: So?
translation.ja: 結果は？

translation.en: They already got a guy on the Metro desk.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm sorry, honey.

translation.en: So they're putting me on a little thing they like to call "Desert Storm."
translation.ja: でも“砂漠の嵐”班で 使ってもらえる

translation.en: -You got the job? -Got the job.
translation.ja: 雇われたの？　すごい！

translation.en: You got the job, baby.
translation.ja: 雇われたの？　すごい！ おめでとう！

translation.en: Oh, John Grogan, I knew it. I just knew it.

translation.en: Okay, look. Watch this. Look.

translation.en: See what happens? Job: done.
translation.ja: 消さなくちゃ　就職：解決

translation.en: -So, what's next? Lunch? -House.

translation.en: -House. -House.

translation.en: --that can transmit remote television pictures... ...of Iraqi ships and other targets.

translation.en: Did you get to the quote about the speed bumps yet?

translation.en: And with that, Janet Dickerson's eyes filled with tears."
translation.ja: “「効果があるのに」と ジャネットは涙ぐんだ”

translation.en: Filled with tears.

translation.en: -Do you like that or is it too corny? -Yeah.

translation.en: -No. -Is it a little over-the-top?

translation.en: Hey, honey, what happened to the Desert Storm piece?

translation.en: That's it. The injured girl's dad's in Kuwait. Is that not in there?

translation.en: I think they cut that.

translation.en: They even-- They spelled your name wrong.

translation.en: -Let me see that. Are you joking? -Forget it.

translation.en: You know what? It's good. It's really good. It's got the facts, it's got color.

translation.en: -It's a really solid piece. -Thanks.

translation.en: She's got her whole life organized and planned out according to these steps.

translation.en: Okay, that's scary. Unbelievable.

translation.en: That has a nice ring to it.

translation.en: Come here.

translation.en: Over here.
translation.ja: ママにパス！

translation.en: The old pro brings it back.
translation.ja: ライン際へ

translation.en: He looks for a little separation, gets an assist from Colleen.
translation.ja: コリーンのアシストで シュート！

translation.en: -Nice shot, Dad. -Come on, "Nice shot"? Come on, Conor.
translation.ja: ナイス･ショット！ ナイス･ショット？ それだけ？

translation.en: -Extraordinary. -Yeah. Again.
translation.ja: 奇跡のショット！

translation.en: No, wait, let me get that. I'll be back.
translation.ja: 電話だ すぐ戻る

translation.en: -All right. -My knees are shot.
translation.ja: ヒザが痛いよ

translation.en: Yes, it is.
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: Hi, how are you? Thanks for getting back to me.
translation.ja: こんにちは　ご連絡をどうも

translation.en: -Darn. -Hey, who was that on the phone?
translation.ja: 誰からの電話？

translation.en: The Philadelphia Inquirer.
translation.ja: 他紙の編集長だ

translation.en: I sent the editor some clips a while back, and he wants to meet.
translation.ja: 前に会った フィラデルフィア･ インクワイアラー紙

translation.en: What's a while back?
translation.ja: いつ会ったの？

translation.en: He was down here on vacation like a month ago...
translation.ja: 先月 休暇で来ていた時⸺

translation.en: ...and he read my stuff, and we kind of had lunch.
translation.ja: ランチに誘われたんだ

translation.en: How do you kind of have lunch?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: Well, I didn't think anything was gonna come of it.
translation.ja: それだけだと思ってた

translation.en: -Okay, but...? -They offered me a job.
translation.ja: じゃ 電話は？ 雇いたいって

translation.en: I mean, I have, you know, an interview.
translation.ja: まずは面接だけど

translation.en: As, like, a columnist or...?
translation.ja: コラムニストとして？

translation.en: -As a reporter. -As a reporter?
translation.ja: 記者だ 記者？　何て答えたの？

translation.en: Well, what did you say?
translation.ja: 記者？　何て答えたの？

translation.en: I said, "Thank you very much, but I'm happy here."
translation.ja: “光栄ですが 今の仕事に満足してます”

translation.en: "Never have I heard someone piss and moan as much as John Grogan.
translation.ja: “ジョン･グローガンは 文句ばかり言う”

translation.en: If he doesn't like it here, he should move."
translation.ja: “よその街へ越せ”

translation.en: Part of my job is to get a response. I'm glad to see a little blood flowing from people.
translation.ja: 読者から反応があるのは いいことじゃないか

translation.en: No, there's a recurring theme here.
translation.ja: 何通も来るぞ

translation.en: The theme is that we got a lot of cranks in Broward County. That's what I'm up against.
translation.ja: フロリダには 気むずかしいやつが多い

translation.en: What I'm trying to say, with all due respect, is that you are one of them.
translation.ja: 言わせてもらうが 君も その１人だ

translation.en: Well, I'm a commentator. Everyone wants me to act like everything's great when there are issues.
translation.ja: 僕は 世の中の問題に対し 発言する立場にいる

translation.en: There's overcrowding, there's crime, there's racial tensions.
translation.ja: 人口過密 犯罪増加 人種間の緊張

translation.en: Every time you turn around, there's a new sky rise even uglier than the--
translation.ja: 醜い超高層が次々に建つ

translation.en: That goes on all over the world. It's not Florida, it's you. What's wrong?
translation.ja: 世界中どこも同じだ 問題は君にある

translation.en: Nothing's wrong. Everyone wants to think:
translation.ja: 何も問題なんかない

translation.en: "Oh, he's turning 40. He's become a curmudgeon."
translation.ja: 40歳を迎え 頑固になったわけじゃない

translation.en: That's not it. Maybe....
translation.ja: 40歳を迎え 頑固になったわけじゃない そうなのかな…

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know, maybe I'm sick of my column.
translation.ja: わからない 自分のコラムに飽きたのかも

translation.en: I don't find the things that I'm saying that interesting.
translation.ja: わからない 自分のコラムに飽きたのかも 前ほど面白いと思えない

translation.en: John, John, you're the comic voice of South Florida. You're a national treasure, for God's sakes.
translation.ja: 君は読者をユーモアで なごませる“国家の宝”だ

translation.en: Maybe a regional treasure.
translation.ja: マイアミの宝

translation.en: -Well, a municipal treasure for sure. -Thank you.
translation.ja: この街の宝だよ

translation.en: Listen, take a vacation. Go away for a couple weeks.
translation.ja: 休暇を取って どこかへ行け ２週間か１ヵ月

translation.en: -Take a month off. -And go where?
translation.ja: 休暇を取って どこかへ行け ２週間か１ヵ月 どこへ？

translation.en: -I don't know. Take-- -I live in a vacation spot.
translation.ja: ここはリゾート地だ

translation.en: Then go someplace where it's painful and sad.
translation.ja: じゃ 暗くて 寂しい土地へ行け

translation.en: Forty is gonna be tough, buddy. I'm not gonna lie to you.
translation.ja: 40歳になるってキツいよ ウソじゃない

translation.en: But we knew that.
translation.ja: でも わかってた

translation.en: We knew this was when Father Time was gonna make his move...
translation.ja: 時の流れは情け容赦なく⸺

translation.en: ...try to take us down a dark alley and just beat the hell out of us.
translation.ja: 僕たち みんなを襲うんだよ

translation.en: You got a little more white around the temples...
translation.ja: こめかみに白髪が 増えたけど⸺

translation.en: ...but it makes you look more distinguished, I think.
translation.ja: こめかみに白髪が 増えたけど⸺ 威厳があって悪くない

translation.en: We both lost a step.
translation.ja: 動きは鈍ったな

translation.en: Well, how's it feel to have your best years behind you?
translation.ja: 輝かしい若さを失った 気持ちは どんなだ？

translation.en: You do everything you wanted to?
translation.ja: 夢を全部 かなえたか？

translation.en: No, me neither.
translation.ja: 僕も そうは言えない

translation.en: All right. You hot? You wanna cool off? Let's do it.
translation.ja: 暑いだろ？　涼みたいか？ ひと泳ぎしよう

translation.en: You know what?
translation.ja: なあ　相棒

translation.en: Not today. You've been on a leash a little too long.
translation.ja: 今日はリードなしだ 長いこと我慢しすぎた

translation.en: Go, go.
translation.ja: 行け！

translation.en: You got a little bit of a second wind.
translation.ja: 若さを取り戻すんだ

translation.en: Go get it.
translation.ja: 行け！

translation.en: -Hey, get your dog! -What?
translation.ja: あなたの犬が！

translation.en: No, no. Please, God, no.
translation.ja: ダメだ　やめろ！

translation.en: No, no, no!
translation.ja: よせ　いけない！

translation.en: Come here, come here. It's okay.
translation.ja: 来るんだ

translation.en: Dude, that was not cool.
translation.ja: 今のは クールじゃなかったぜ

translation.en: Come on, girl, let's go!
translation.ja: おいで！　帰るぞ

translation.en: Great.
translation.ja: まいった

translation.en: Man, you are the world's worst dog. You know that, right?
translation.ja: お前は世界一 バカな犬だよ 自分で わかってるだろ

translation.en: You were top five going into the day...
translation.ja: 今朝は “５番目”くらいだけど⸺

translation.en: ...and with this little stunt, you moved into number one.
translation.ja: あの騒ぎで また“世界一”に

translation.en: And I take my hat off to you.
translation.ja: さすが お前だよ

translation.en: Surprise!
translation.ja: サプライズ！

translation.en: -Happy birthday. -Yes, you can help me. But hold on, hold on. On three.
translation.ja: 手伝ってくれ ３つ数えたらだぞ

translation.en: But don't beg, Marley.
translation.ja: どんどん食えよ

translation.en: That's not good. Because we don't have to.
translation.ja: 遠慮する必要なんてないんだ

translation.en: Tell me the truth. Were you surprised?
translation.ja: 正直に答えて ビックリした？

translation.en: Completely, yes. Thank you.
translation.ja: とても驚いた　ありがとう

translation.en: -Really? -I was. You guys got me.
translation.ja: とても驚いた　ありがとう 完ぺきに やられた

translation.en: We got you.
translation.ja: 大成功！

translation.en: Are you ready for your birthday present?
translation.ja: プレゼントの心構えは？

translation.en: There's more? I don't need any other present.
translation.ja: ウソだろ　まだあるのか？

translation.en: -Happy birthday. -What was that?
translation.ja: お誕生日おめでとう 何のキス？

translation.en: That was my blessing to take that job in Philadelphia.
translation.ja: フィラデルフィアの仕事への 私からの祝福よ

translation.en: That was months ago. I'm not thinking about that.
translation.ja: 何ヵ月も前の話だよ

translation.en: Well, then any other job. We'll follow you wherever you wanna go.
translation.ja: あなたが行くところ 私たちは ついていく

translation.en: I understand, but I'm not gonna do that. I'm not gonna uproot us.
translation.ja: この地を離れる気はない

translation.en: We've got our friends, the kids enjoy school...
translation.ja: 友達もいるし 子供たちは学校も

translation.en: ...and I've got my poker game.
translation.ja: 友達もいるし 子供たちは学校も 僕のポーカー仲間や…

translation.en: -I couldn't possibly. -First of all, it's just an interview.
translation.ja: 僕のポーカー仲間や… まずは面接よ 採用の話は それから

translation.en: You don't have the job yet.
translation.ja: まずは面接よ 採用の話は それから

translation.en: And second of all, honey, you don't have any friends.
translation.ja: それに あなたには 友達がいない

translation.en: That's right. I was wondering, who were all those strangers tonight?

translation.en: I hired them.
translation.ja: 私が雇ったの

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is that our life is here, and I'm okay with that.
translation.ja: 僕たちの生活は ここにあるんだ

translation.en: Our life is wherever we are.

translation.en: -That's it. And you're not happy here. -That's not true.
translation.ja: 今のあなたは幸せじゃない

translation.en: You're not happy doing that column. You're restless. I can feel it.

translation.en: I'm not.
translation.ja: そんなことない

translation.en: I feel it every day that you read Sebastian's articles.

translation.en: I feel it every time you sit an extra five minutes in your car... ...before you come in.

translation.en: -I don't do that. -You do.
translation.ja: 違うよ

translation.en: -I'm checking things in the car, I'm not-- -I just think it's time for a change.

translation.en: I'm 40, Jen.
translation.ja: 僕は40歳だ

translation.en: Maybe at 39, but I'm too-- I don't know.
translation.ja: 39歳なら まだしも… 今さら変化だなんて いくら何でも遅すぎるよ

translation.en: It feels a little late to be making big changes. No, no, no.
translation.ja: 今さら変化だなんて いくら何でも遅すぎるよ

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.ja: 何をする？

translation.en: We're not old, John.
translation.ja: まだ年じゃない

translation.en: We can still surprise ourselves.
translation.ja: 十分 刺激的なのよ

translation.en: See, most girls would do a swan dive... ...but you know that a cannonball is so much sexier.

translation.en: So are you ready for your other birthday present or what?

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: もらうよ

translation.en: This is like an embarrassment of riches, this birthday.

translation.en: They just keep coming. It's like Hanukkah.

translation.en: See? We're not old.
translation.ja: 私たち まだ若いわ

translation.en: Grogan.
translation.ja: グローガン

translation.en: -Just wanna wish you good luck up there. -Thanks. Yeah.
translation.ja: 向こうで頑張れよ ありがとう

translation.en: It'll be good. I'm gonna miss everybody. -I'm gonna miss your laugh. -Yeah.
translation.ja: あなたの笑い声が きっと懐かしくなる

translation.en: There's a good chance that every piece of advice I gave you was a lot of crap.
translation.ja: 俺のアドバイスなど クソの役にも立たんな

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I appreciate it just the same.
translation.ja: とんでもない 一応は感謝してます

translation.en: Well, at this point, a mushy guy would tell you he was proud of you...
translation.ja: 感傷的なやつなら⸺ “誇りに思う”とか言って ハグするかな

translation.en: ...give you a hug, and send you on your way.
translation.ja: “誇りに思う”とか言って ハグするかな

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you're not that guy, sir.
translation.ja: あなたは そういう人じゃない

translation.en: Grogan, just for the record, you surprised the hell out of me.
translation.ja: グローガン 君には驚かされたよ

translation.en: That's my specialty.
translation.ja: 僕の得意技です

translation.en: -Are we here yet? -No.
translation.ja: もう着く？ いや

translation.en: -Now? -We got a couple hours to go.
translation.ja: まだ？ あと２時間は走る

translation.en: -Now? -Soak it up.
translation.ja: 楽しみに

translation.en: -Now? -We must be near it. Are we getting hot or cold?
translation.ja: あと少し

translation.en: -Why are we turning in here? -We're living here.
translation.ja: なぜ曲がるの？ ここに住むから

translation.en: I want a moment of silence just to take this in, okay?
translation.ja: 新しい家を じっくり見せてくれ

translation.en: Before the pandemonium. Look at this.
translation.ja: 大声で騒いだりせずに すごいだろ

translation.en: -Here we go. -Come on, we're here.
translation.ja: 降りるぞ さあ　着いたわよ

translation.en: Marley. Marley, no.
translation.ja: マーリー　ダメだ

translation.en: And we're home.
translation.ja: “わが家”だな

translation.en: Hey, Andy Rooney. If you're knocking off, I'll walk with you to the train.
translation.ja: じき終わるなら 駅まで一緒に行こう

translation.en: Okay, I'm ready. Put an exclamation point here.
translation.ja: いいよ　“！”を打ったら おしまいだ

translation.en: Mark Twain said not to use exclamation points... ...because it's like laughing at your own joke.
translation.ja: “！”の使用は 自分の ジョークに笑う素人だと

translation.en: Sometimes you gotta laugh at your own joke because it's funny.
translation.ja: でも おかしければ笑おう

translation.en: -It's here, it's here, it's here! -Mom, get up, get up, get up.

translation.en: Come on, Dad. Look, Daddy. Come on, come on, come on.

translation.en: Remember, angels can fly, so you gotta get the wings up high.
translation.ja: 天使は飛べるんだよ 羽を大きく動かして

translation.en: Yeah. Now, that one's coming. Now you can really see it.
translation.ja: 天使の形になってきた

translation.en: Guys, lunch is ready.
translation.ja: ランチよ！

translation.en: -Okay. Heading in. -Take that.
translation.ja: 入ろう

translation.en: -I'll get you. -Let's go. Marley!
translation.ja: おいで　マーリー！

translation.en: -Come on, guys. -Marley, come on. Marley.
translation.ja: マーリー！

translation.en: No, no, you know what, honey? Let him be. He's happy.
translation.ja: 遊ばせてあげて　喜んでる

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: What are you doing in here?
translation.ja: そこで何を？

translation.en: You're going for the bunk bed tonight?
translation.ja: ２段ベッドで寝るのか？

translation.en: Pretty good day. I mean, the snow? Come on.
translation.ja: いい日だったな 雪で遊べたし

translation.en: All right. Sleep tight.
translation.ja: じゃ よく寝るんだぞ

translation.en: -Too much color? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 個性が出すぎ？

translation.en: Don't get me wrong, it's a good piece. But you're reporting now, John.
translation.ja: とても面白いが 今の君は記者なんだ

translation.en: I want you to tell the story, I don't want you to be in the story.
translation.ja: 自分を消して書かないと

translation.en: I'm pretty sure I don't mention myself in there.
translation.ja: 自分のことは何も…

translation.en: The point is, I still feel you in there.
translation.ja: 君の考えが表れている

translation.en: And all I'm saying is less you and more facts.
translation.ja: 事実だけを書くんだ

translation.en: Got it.
translation.ja: わかりました

translation.en: -Door's always open. -Thanks.
translation.ja: いつでも相談に

translation.en: Here comes the old pro. He shows up for the fourth quarter.
translation.ja: スター選手 登場！ 第４クォーターから参戦

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, yes. He catches it.
translation.ja: キャッチ！

translation.en: Then he fends off one guy.
translation.ja: 敵をかわし⸺

translation.en: He's running through there. He's shaking tackles left and right.
translation.ja: タックルをよけながら 力強く進みます！

translation.en: They can't get him, because he's got too much--
translation.ja: タックルをよけながら 力強く進みます！ 誰も倒せません！

translation.en: And Grogan goes down. Down goes Grogan.
translation.ja: グローガン ついにダウンしました

translation.en: -You're home early. -That's right.
translation.ja: 早いのね

translation.en: I had to come home and teach these kids how to play football the right way.
translation.ja: 早く帰って 子供たちに アメフトを教えたくて

translation.en: -Guys, seriously, dinner's in an hour. -Okay.
translation.ja: 夕食は１時間後よ

translation.en: And I want you to finish your homework...
translation.ja: 宿題をして

translation.en: ...and take off those shoes before you come in.
translation.ja: 靴を脱いで入って

translation.en: Yeah, take off your shoes.
translation.ja: そうよ　靴を脱いで

translation.en: Ground and pound, ground and pound, ground and pound.
translation.ja: コナー　ダウン！ コナー　ダウン！

translation.en: My God.
translation.ja: まいったな

translation.en: I come home and it's like I got mugged.
translation.ja: 家に帰ったら 襲われた

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: What's wrong with him, Dad?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: Nothing's wrong. He's just tired. Right, Dad?
translation.ja: 疲れてるだけさ だよね？

translation.en: Yeah. I think the football took it out of him.
translation.ja: そう　遊びすぎたんだよ

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: I don't know, I just don't understand. A year ago, you couldn't wait to be done with your column.
translation.ja: １年前はコラムなんか やめたがっていたのに

translation.en: I know, but now I got this guy... ...going through every sentence with a fine-toothed comb...
translation.ja: そうだけど 今はボスに 原稿を全部直される

translation.en: ...and I gotta admit, I miss the freedom, where I could just--
translation.ja: 自由に書いていた頃が…

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だい？

translation.en: It's just-- It's exhausting sometimes, John.
translation.ja: 時々 あなたに疲れるの

translation.en: You always wanting something that you don't have.
translation.ja: ないものばかり求めてる

translation.en: Are you happy?
translation.ja: 君は幸せ？

translation.en: -I mean, none of this was part of the plan. -No.
translation.ja: あれは計画と違うだろ？ そうよ

translation.en: No, it wasn't part of the plan.
translation.ja: 計画とは大違い

translation.en: But it's so much better.
translation.ja: でも はるかにいいわ

translation.en: You know? I'm just sort of done making plans.
translation.ja: もう計画は やめたのよ

translation.en: Marley. Oh, gross.
translation.ja: マーリー！ クサい！

translation.en: Seems like somebody needs to go out.
translation.ja: 外で用事があるようね

translation.en: All right. Marley.
translation.ja: よし　マーリー

translation.en: Come on. Come on, boy.
translation.ja: 行こうか

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.ja: おい　雨か

translation.en: Now it's really coming down.
translation.ja: 外は どしゃ降りだよ

translation.en: Marley?
translation.ja: マーリー

translation.en: Where did he go? Marley!
translation.ja: どこへ？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: I don't know, he's just-- He's not coming back.
translation.ja: 呼んでも戻ってこない

translation.en: -Marley! -Well, he couldn't have gone far.
translation.ja: その辺にいるはずだ

translation.en: -Marley! -I'll come with you. Hold on.
translation.ja: 私も行く　待って

translation.en: Marley! I don't know where he could've gone.
translation.ja: どこへ行ったんだろう

translation.en: Maybe he went next door again in the barn.
translation.ja: お隣の馬小屋かしら

translation.en: -Well, we can check in the woodshed. -Okay.
translation.ja: 薪(まき)置き場を見てみる

translation.en: -Do you see anything? -No, nothing.
translation.ja: いたか？ いいえ　いない

translation.en: -I gotta go talk to them. -Okay.
translation.ja: 子供たちに話すわ

translation.en: Oh, wow, it's pouring out there.
translation.ja: すごい雨よ

translation.en: Did you find him?
translation.ja: 見つかった？

translation.en: You know what? He's out exploring.
translation.ja: マーリーは 探検しに行ったみたい

translation.en: You know how he loves the woods.
translation.ja: 森が大好きだから

translation.en: Bobby says dogs, when they're gonna die...
translation.ja: 犬は死ぬ時 いなくなるんだ

translation.en: ...they go away to do it. That's what his beagle did.
translation.ja: ボビーのビーグルも そうだったって

translation.en: Well, you know what, that's true for beagles... ...but not Labs like Marley.
translation.ja: ビーグルは そうだけど マーリーみたいなラブは違う

translation.en: He's just out causing trouble. Don't worry.
